name: Tic-Tac-Toe GUI
description:
NOTE: I have again given the source code named 'main.py' if you want to tweak the settings or see how I did it (although it probably isn't very optimized or pretty).

This is a very quick remake of Tic-Tac-Toe in Pygame which took me about an hour or two to set up and make it look somewhat ok. This didn't take me long, so there are probably going to be a lot of bugs. If you see any, then please give me some feedback in the comments :)
